rules_text:
Ikel's Enforcer can't block.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ikel's Enforcer. If the sacrificed creature was a Soldier, Ikel's Enforcer gains menace and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]The humans in Ikel's army don't realize that they're rations, not reserves.[/i]
